Public NotInheritable Class XmlAttributeCollection Inherits XmlNamedNodeMap Implements ICollection
public ref class XmlAttributeCollection sealed : System::Xml::XmlNamedNodeMap, System::Collections::ICollection
type XmlAttributeCollection = class inherit XmlNamedNodeMap interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示可以按名称或索引访问的属性的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attributes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlAttributeCollection` 扩展了类通过添加强类型化帮助器方法。`XmlAttributeCollection` extends the class by adding strongly typed helper methods. 此类可用于添加、 删除或修改集合中的特性。You can use this class to add, remove, or modify attributes in the collection. `XmlAttributeCollection` 返回的属性。`XmlAttributeCollection` is returned by the property.

related.span: 访问 DOM 中的属性

span.span: Accessing Attributes in the DOM

related.span: 按名称或索引检索未排序节点

span.span: Unordered Node Retrieval by Name or Index
XML Document Object Model (DOM)

summary.span: 将指定的特性插入集合，并将其作为集合中的最后一个节点。

span.span: Inserts the specified attribute as the last node in the collection.
The to append to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经存在于集合中具有相同名称的属性，从集合删除的原始属性和`node`添加到集合的末尾。If an attribute with the same name is already present in the collection, the original attribute is removed from the collection and `node` is added to the end of the collection. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例将新属性添加到文档。The following example adds a new attribute to a document. Public Function InsertAfter (newNode As XmlAttribute, refNode As XmlAttribute) As XmlAttribute

span.span: The to insert.

param.name: refNode

span.span: The that is the reference attribute.

param.span: newNode 放置在 refNode 之后。

span.span: newNode is placed after the refNode.

summary.span: 将指定特性直接插入到指定引用特性之后。

span.span: Inserts the specified attribute immediately after the specified reference attribute.
The to insert into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经存在于集合中具有相同名称的属性，从集合删除的原始属性和`newNode`插入到集合。If an attribute with the same name is already present in the collection, the original attribute is removed from the collection and `newNode` is inserted into the collection. 如果`refNode`是`null`，`newNode`插入到集合的开头。If `refNode` is `null`, `newNode` is inserted at the beginning of the collection. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例将新属性添加到文档。The following example adds a new attribute to a document. param.name: node
param.span: 要存储在此集合中的特性节点。

span.span: An attribute node to store in this collection.

param.span: 以后可以使用节点的名称访问该节点。

span.span: The node will later be accessible using the name of the node.

param.span: 如果集合中已存在具有该名称的节点，则用新的进行替换；否则，将把该节点追加到集合的末尾。

span.span: If a node with that name is already present in the collection, it is replaced by the new one; otherwise, the node is appended to the end of the collection.
Adds a using its property

returns.span: 如果 替换具有相同名称的现有节点，则返回旧节点；否则返回新添加的节点。

span.span: If the replaces an existing node with the same name, the old node is returned; otherwise, the added node is returned.
